page.title: 12HARDWICK PARISH CHURCH
page.content: St Margaret's Hardwick is 1 of the 8 Hempnall Group Parishes working together with 2 fulltime & 1 unpaid parttime clergy.For 200 yrs Hardwick & Shelton have been joined with 1 P.C.C. Fortnightly services are held here,the lady organist has been playing for 52 yrs. Monthly group services move around the parishes,coffee is served afterwards to goodsized congregations. The Junior Church is usually held at Hempnall, children attend classes then join their parents at the Eucharist. Holiday clubs & events are organised for all age groups.Hardwick has a Mothers Union-12 members meet monthly, usually in a home.The church supports St James Mission Hospital in Lesotho.A harvest supper is held for the group. Of interest are the 14th century wall painting,2 chest tombs & a Jacobean tester pew.
